lead_paragraph: Mr. Putin, at his annual marathon news conference, said again that his country’s modernizing forces could repulse any attacker.

byline.original: By NEIL MacFARQUHAR and IVAN NECHEPURENKO

headline.print_headline: Putin Chides Democrats for ‘Humiliation’ of Clinton Defeat
headline.main: Vladimir Putin, Unsurprised by Trump’s Remarks, Says Russia Wants No Nuclear Arms Race
